languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Вы целы? В своем уме? Хотя что я спрашиваю... ответ давно очевиден". {n}Последнюю фразу сенешаль бормочет себе под нос.{/n}
"Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Вы целы? В своем уме? Хотя что я спрашиваю... ответ давно очевиден". {n}Последнюю фразу сенешаль бормочет себе под нос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? And sane? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
"Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? And sane? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
"Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
"Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
"Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
"Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! ¿Está bien? ¿Conserva aún la cordura? Para qué pregunto... eso último lleva estando claro mucho tiempo». {n}El Senescal masculla esta última frase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! ¿Está bien? ¿Conserva aún la cordura? Para qué pregunto... eso último lleva estando claro mucho tiempo». {n}El Senescal masculla esta última frase.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Êtes-vous indemne ? De corps comme d'esprit ? Ah, je ne sais pas pourquoi je pose la question... La réponse est évidente depuis quelque temps déjà, » {n}dit le sénéchal à mi-voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Êtes-vous indemne ? De corps comme d'esprit ? Ah, je ne sais pas pourquoi je pose la question... La réponse est évidente depuis quelque temps déjà, » {n}dit le sénéchal à mi-voix.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！お怪我はありませんか？お気は確かで？我はなぜこのような質問を…今の時点で、答えは分かり切っているだろうに」{n}家令長の言葉は、最後の部分は小声の呟きになっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！お怪我はありませんか？お気は確かで？我はなぜこのような質問を…今の時点で、答えは分かり切っているだろうに」{n}家令長の言葉は、最後の部分は小声の呟きになっていた。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人！您没受伤吧？精神还好吗？我干嘛要问啊……答案早就显而易见了。”{n}阿贝拉德小声嘟囔出了最后这句话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！您没受伤吧？精神还好吗？我干嘛要问啊……答案早就显而易见了。”{n}阿贝拉德小声嘟囔出了最后这句话。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Seid Ihr unverletzt? Bei klarem Verstand? Warum ich überhaupt frage ... die Antwort ist seit einer Weile offensichtlich." {n}Der Truchsess murmelt den letzten Satz leise in seinen Bart.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Seid Ihr unverletzt? Bei klarem Verstand? Warum ich überhaupt frage ... die Antwort ist seit einer Weile offensichtlich." {n}Der Truchsess murmelt den letzten Satz leise in seinen Bart.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Yaralandınız mı? Kendinizde misiniz? Bunu neden soruyorum ki... Yanıt zaten deminden beri belli." {n}Seneşal, son cümleyi kısık bir sesle söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Are you uninjured? Sound of mind? Why am I even asking... the answer has been obvious for a while now." {n}The Seneschal mutters the last sentence under his breath.{/n}
